name: Isolation
overview: A board game for one or two players from Fender Tucker and released in Loadstar 128 #15. The game works in 80-columns mode. Welcome to ISOLATION, a board game on computer. The board consists of 16 colored squares and is surrounded by 16 colored pieces. There are three types of games: SOLITAIRE - where you play against yourself HUMAN AGAINST MACHINE - you challenge your C-128 HUMAN AGAINST HUMAN - you play against a friend Use the CRSR keys to move the white cursor to the piece you want to move and press RETURN. The chosen piece will blink. Then move the cursor to the board
